mapper.select: /* homeMapper.selectTrafficTrendForMyArchive */ SELECT MONTHS.MONTH AS month , COUNT(LAV.USER_UID) AS visitCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL N MONTH), '%Y. %m') AS MONTH FROM ( SELECT 0 AS N UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 ) AS NUMS ) AS MONTHS LEFT JOIN LOG_ARCHIVE_VISIT LAV ON DATE_FORMAT(LAV.VIEW_DATE, '%Y. %m') = MONTHS.MONTH AND LAV.USER_UID = #{userUid} GROUP BY MONTHS.MONTH ORDER BY MONTHS.MONTH

/* homeMapper.selectTop5MostViewedArticlesInTheLast30Days */ SELECT A.ARTICLE_UID AS articleUid , A.TITLE AS title , LAV.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount , F.URL_PATH AS thumbnailUrlPath FROM ARTICLE A INNER JOIN ( SELECT LAV.ARTICLE_UID , COUNT(*) AS VIEW_COUNT FROM LOG_ARTICLE_VIEW LAV WHERE LAV.VIEW_DATE >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY GROUP BY LAV.ARTICLE_UID ) LAV ON LAV.ARTICLE_UID = A.ARTICLE_UID LEFT JOIN `FILE` F ON F.FILE_UID = A.THUMBNAIL_UID WHERE A.USER_UID = #{userUid} AND A.FLAG_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY LAV.VIEW_COUNT DESC LIMIT 5
